sn39.1-15:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto vajjisu viharati ukkacelayam gangaya nadiya tire.
sn39.1-15:1.2: Atha kho samandako paribbajako yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
sn39.1-15:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho samandako paribbajako ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn39.1-15:2.5: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada, etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti?
sn39.1-15:2.6: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
sn39.1-15:3.1: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti?
sn39.1-15:3.2: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, seyyathidam—
sn39.1-15:3.4: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
sn39.1-15:3.5: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etassa nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya.
